DataElement.preferredName: Orthodontist Removable Maxilla  Retainer Device Component Additional Treatment Regimen  Recommendation Hour Daily Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A count of the number of hours in a day that the orthodontist recommends the patient use the removable retainer on their maxillary arch immediately after the previous procedure period is complete

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Orthodontist Removable Maxilla  Retainer Device Component Additional Treatment Regimen  Recommendation
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The orthodontist recommends that the way the patient use the removable retainer on their maxillary arch immediately after the previous procedure period is complete should be continued with no foreseeable end date

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A dentist specializing in the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of malocclusions of the teeth and their surrounding structures.

Concepts.definition: A dentist specializing in the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of malocclusions of the teeth and their surrounding structures.

Property.preferredName: Removable Maxilla Retainer Device Component Additional Treatment Regimen Recommendation

Concepts.definition: The upper jawbone in vertebrates; it is fused to the cranium.
A physical device designed to hold something in place.
A treatment plan that specifies the dosage, the schedule, and the duration of treatment.
Advice telling someone what the best thing to do is.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: In modern usage, an hour is defined as a unit of time 60 minutes, or 3600 seconds in length. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day.:Occurring or done each day.:To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.

Concepts.definition: A unit measure of time equal to 3,600 seconds or 60 minutes. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day.
Determining the number or amount of something.
